body: Well ofc I get this one for my first random doujin
i hope this artist make more hinata h-manga.
I would like NaruSaku , the story doesn't broke my heart just coz NTR ...I hope u can create another NaruSaku stories , i dont care about NTR 😋
Hate the story not the character
@The_¥_collector Yeah because you definitely know how it is to have sex with a fictional character that was never shown having sex before in the manga
does the guy below me think that the artist can see his comment?

Nice. I look for this kind of stuff. I do feel like you could have done more, but hey, I have no complaints. I hope you continue to do NaruHina works, and I mean just NaruHina, not with Sakura or Ino etc... I know you've done NaruHinaSaku (or is it NaruSakuHina) works and I'm not gonna say anything bad about them but as a pure NaruHina fan, I do hope you'll continue works like this. But you're  the artist, so it's your choice but I hope my opinion makes an impact on your decisions. And I think your Hinata looks fine.
Well then you need to repent for saying such blasphemy.
I never liked hinata because of this exact reason, she is a boring lay
